Abstract:
Kannur Corporation
300 lakh rupees administrative sanction for road work , Sadhu Company Mundiat under Local Self_Government Department
Subsection: Sadhu Company Mundiat under Local Self_Government Department
Body:
Annexure 2 of the Budget Estimates for the year 2021-22 in Volume 2 Serial No.
Sadhu Company Mundayat in Kannur Corporation limits included as 276
Detailed project report of road works, detailing of said works
Estimates for Mayo to obtain administrative approval for the work
It was submitted as per the reference through the Chief Engineer of the Local Government Department.

2. The Government has examined the matter in detail. Based on the
Schedule No. 276 of Budget Estimates for the year 2021-22, Vol. 2, Appendix 5

+

Kannur Corporation incorporated as and allocated 20%
Sadhu Company in the limit for Mundiat road work '4217-60-051-94 (5)'
In the title, an administrative sanction of Rs.300 lakhs is ordered.
